review:
Tv is working fine. I'm using it now for 3 weeks and I'll be straight forward writing pros and cons for those who want to purchase one.
pros:
1. Sound is awesome, thanks to dolby atmos.
2. picture quality is good most of times, but sometimes colors seems faded.
3. WiFi connectivity working fine, and Ethernet too.
4. support most audio and video formats.
5. YouTube and Netflix are integrated, working fine.
6. smart tv interfere is easygoing.
cons.
1. most ports are at back side, so only HDMI and 1 usb port is available for wall mount sideways.
2. smart TV isn't actually smart. it's like a hoax for most of users.only you can use YouTube, netflix and browser. rest apps are useless.
3. can't side load or download other android apps.
4. app store is useless

Don't buy smart TV unless you've unlimited WiFi or something as it uses lots of data. rest it's good. those who're going for first time smart tv, must buy.

will be adding more pros and cons after further use.

Brought this TV on the first flash sale on 7th May. Flipkart got it delivered to my home the very next day. So great service by FLIPKART.
Now, coming on to TV :
• Design is minimalistic with very narrow bezels at the sides. Looks premium actually
• Display is really crisp and it comes with a lot of customizations that the users can change to suit their needs.
• Smart TV interface is nice and easy to understand
• Volume is pretty loud, clear and immersive thanks to Dolby Surround sound at this price range
• Side positioning of USB and HDMI makes it easier to collect devices to the TV
• Wall mounts supplied with the TV set are very basic and cheap to be honest. If you are opting for Wall mount, but a better one somewhere else.
• TV remote is sturdy and has all options for Smart TV.
• Power Cable supplied is a bit short. (1M I think)
• TV app store is the most useless thing. Doesn't have much useful apps. It let me down.
• *Verdict* : You won't get a much better SMART TV at this range. If you don't mind limited apps then go for this. Else if apps are everything for ya, look elsewhere.

writing this review after using for 12 hours.
this iffalcon 32 inch smart tv is much better than mi or Thomson in this price range.
got it delivered in 24 hours by Flipkart.
it is simple to use.
picture quality is very good and sound quality even with 10w is much much better quality wise.
smart TV functions are good.
if you looking for simple to use and value for money go for it.

I have been using a 32 inch Sony Bravia before replacing it with iFFALCON. Have been using the TV for some weeks now and overall it has been a satisfying experience. Rather than going deep into the known specs of the TV, providing a review here based on my experience as a normal user.

Design

Very lightweight and easy to handle. From front side it looks premium. The thin bezel sides give the TV a 'less frame - more screen' kind of look. The back side is also less bulky compared to its competitors. The USB and HDMI ports are well positioned at the left back side and are easy to connect. But the Audio-Video ports are at the back side and wires might stay pressed to the wall. The wall mount provided seems to lack in quality a bit, but it might just be enough, thanks to the lightweight TV. The remote is slim, long and solid with well placed buttons.

Display and Sound

The display is absolutely stunning with crisp and clear viewing angles. The customization options in settings are seriously nice, both for display as well as sound. The sound quality is very good as well as loud.

Smartness

It satisfies all your basic needs expected from a Smart TV. Connects quickly to WiFi network available. It has some in built browsers and apps like YouTube, Netflix, T-Browser etc. along with an App Store where you can search for apps like Hungama, ErosNow etc and other apps based on categories. YouTube is really good and you can see videos in the original HD clarity. Have not tried NetFlix yet. The TV interface even provides recommendation and categorization of videos like sports, education, music, news etc. Games are also available.

The responsiveness is fast enough, maximum 2-3 seconds in worst case scenarios. The only problem with remote is while typing and searching: no in-built alphabets buttons in the remote, so lot of click with navigation buttons needed to reach the alphabetical characters in on-screen keyboard.

Conclusion

In short, you get a Smart TV with good looks, crystal clear display, loud speakers with digital sound, all at this price! At the price range, I doubt if there is a better option available. I strongly recommend this one if your budget is between INR 12K-14K.

Go for it!

First of all a big THANKS to flipkart for delivering this TV within 12 hours of ordering it. That was quite remarkable.
Now, to talk about TV-
1) I was not expecting a 10W speaker to be very effective, but what surprised was the clarity and Bass effects it gave. It's loud enough to give quite a good competition to a decent subwoofer. Thanks to DOLBY.
2) Installation of the TV was so simple that, I was able to do it myself within 10-15Mins. (Could not wait to try it until the Service guy could come :D )
3) TV demo was done in the evening as it was promised by Flipkart. Thanks to them for making it happen within a day.
4) For this price, the TV has decent specs. The applications available might let you down though. Since I do not use too many applications what is provided there is more than enough (Mostly use Youtube and Netflix)
5) TV remote is excellent, well built and has all the options.
6) Playing movies through USB is damn easy, totally happy with "Movies" picture mode and "Sound" mode that this TV provides. Made it feel like, watching in a theater when lights off.
7) Connecting to Wi-Fi was very easy.
8) T-Cast works well. Also, Screen Mirroring

Did not find any issue with the TV till now. Hope this lasts for long. Loving it. A real winner at this price range.

Have been using it from last 5 days. Good for the price range of 13k, go for it. But dont expect more.
